title: Hello
description: Raise your hand near your head and wave slightly.

title: Thank You
description: Place your fingertips near your chin and move your hand forward.

title: Yes
description: Make a fist and nod it up and down, like your head saying yes.

title: No
description: Bring your index and middle fingers together with thumb and tap them.

title: I Love You
description: Extend your thumb, index finger, and little finger while folding the middle and ring fingers.

title: Help
description: Place one fist on the other palm and lift both slightly upward.

title: Stop
description: Hold one hand upright like a wall and strike its palm with the other hand.

title: Good Morning
description: Touch your chin then move your hand outward, followed by raising your arm upward like the sun rising.

title: Good Night
description: Touch your chin then move your hand outward, then bring one arm under the other like a roof.

title: Please
description: Place your flat hand on your chest and move it in a circular motion.

title: Sorry
description: Make a fist and rub it in a circle over your chest.

title: Friend
description: Hook your index fingers together, first one way then the other.
